name: Attack
note:
La compétence #1 sera utilisée lorsque
vous sélectionnerez la commande Attaque.

name: Defend
note:
La compétence #2 sera utilisée lorsque
vous sélectionnerez la commande Garde.

name: -- Elemental spells --
note:
Below is the list of all the basic spells
using elements.
Basic spells are low level and low rank
spells, doing a few damage but with a low
MP cost.

description: A basic spell using fire.
name: Fire
note:
Basic spell of Fire.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using thunder.
name: Thunder
note:
Basic spell of Thunder.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using ice.
name: Ice
note:
Basic spell of Ice.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using water.
name: Water
note:
Basic spell of Water.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using earth.
name: Stone
note:
Basic spell of Earth.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using wind.
name: Wind
note:
Basic spell of Wind.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using light.
message1: cast a flash of divine light !
name: Light
note:
Basic spell of Light.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using darkness.
name: Darkness
note:
Basic spell of Darkness.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using arcane.
message1: cast an explosion of arcane energy !
name: Arcane
note:
Basic spell of Arcane.
Low cost, low damage.

description: A basic spell using life in an offensive way.
name: Life
note:
Basic spell of Life.
Low cost, low damage, small HP recovery.

description: A basic spell using death.
message1: shred the enemy soul and absorb a part !
name: Death
note:
Basic spell of Death.
Low cost, low damage, small HP recovery.

name: -- Healing spells --
note:
Below is the list of all the spells
related to healing.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a small amount of HP to
a single ally.
message1: use some energy for healing wounds !
name: Heal
note:
Basic Healing spell.
Give to the target a small amount of HP.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a small amount of HP to
all allies.
message1: use some energy for healing all wounds !
name: Mass Heal
note:
Mass version of the Heal spell.
Less powerful and giving less HP, it heal
all the group.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a medium amount of HP to
a single ally.
message1: use some energy for healing wounds !
name: Enforced Heal
note:
Second level of Healing spell.
More effective. Give back a medium amount of
HP but cost more MP.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a medium amount of HP to
all allies.
message1: use some energy for healing all wounds !
name: Enforced Mass Heal
note:
Second level of Mass Healing spell.
More effective, give back more HP but cost
more MP.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a large amount of HP to
a single ally.
message1: use some energy for healing wounds !
name: Mighty Heal
note:
Last level of Healing spell.
More effective. Give back a high amount of
HP but cost a lot MP.

description:
A neutral spell for healing a large amount of HP to
all allies.
message1: use some energy for healing all wounds !
name: Mighty Mass Heal
note:
Last level of Mass Healing spell.
More effective. Give back a high amount of
HP but cost a lot MP.

description:
A neutral spell able to bring back to consciousness
a knocked out ally with half HP.
name: Reanimation
note:
Basic Ressurection spell.
Bring back to life a KOed ally with 50% HP.

description:
A neutral spell able to bring back to consciousness
a knocked out ally with full HP.
name: Ressurection
note:
Basic Ressurection spell.
Bring back to life a KOed ally with 100% HP.

name: -- Elemental++ spells --
note:
Below is the list of all the spells
using elements classified as "++"
"++" spells are medium-high level/rank
spells, doing more damages but with a higher
MP cost

description:
A stronger spell using fire. Small chance to burn
target and deal damage over time.
name: Fire++
note:
Second spell of Fire.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Burn target.

description:
A stronger spell using thunder. Small chance to stun
target, making it eventually unable to act.
name: Thunder++
note:
Second spell of Thunder.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Stun target.

description:
A stronger spell using ice. Small chance to freeze
target, making it unable to act.
name: Ice++
note:
Second spell of Ice.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Freeze target.

description:
A stronger spell using water. Small chance to slow
target and delay its action turn.
name: Water++
note:
Second spell of Water.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Slow target.

description:
A stronger spell using earth. Small chance to stun
target, making it eventually unable to act.
name: Stone++
note:
Second spell of Earth.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Stun target.

description:
A stronger spell using wind. Small chance to slow
target and delay its action turn.
name: Wind++
note:
Second spell of Wind.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Slow target.

description:
A stronger spell using light. Small chance to blind
target, increasing chances to miss.
message1: cast a flash of divine light !
name: Light++
note:
Second spell of Light.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Blind target.

description:
A stronger spell using darkness. Small chance to
confuse target, making it able to attack its allies.
name: Darkness++
note:
Second spell of Darkness.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Confuse target.

description:
A stronger spell using water. Small chance to mute
target, making it unable to use spells.
message1: cast a bolt of arcane energy !
name: Arcane++
note:
Second spell of Arcane.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Mute target.

description:
A stronger spell using life. Small chance to blind
target, increasing chances to miss.
name: Life++
note:
Second spell of Life.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Blind target.
Better HP recovery.

description:
A stronger spell using ice. Small chance to freeze
target, making it unable to act.
message1: shred the enemy soul and absorb a part !
name: Death++
note:
Second spell of Death.
Medium cost, medium damage.
Small chance to Freeze target.
Better HP recovery.

name: -- Elemental O spells --
note:
Below is the list of all the basic mass 
spells using elements, also called "O"
spells.
"O" spells are low-medium level/rank
spells, doing a few damage but with a medium
MP cost and touching all targets.

description: A mass spell using fire. Touch all targets.
name: Fire O
note:
Third spell of Fire.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using thunder. Touch all targets.
name: Thunder O
note:
Third spell of Thunder.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using ice. Touch all targets.
name: Ice O
note:
Third spell of Ice.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using water. Touch all targets.
name: Water O
note:
Third spell of Water.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using earth. Touch all targets.
name: Stone O
note:
Third spell of Earth.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using wind. Touch all targets.
name: Wind O
note:
Third spell of Wind.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using light. Touch all targets.
name: Light O
note:
Third spell of Light.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using darkness. Touch all targets.
name: Darkness O
note:
Third spell of Darkness.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description: A mass spell using arcane. Touch all targets.
name: Arcane O
note:
Third spell of Arcane.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.

description:
A mass spell using life. Touch all targets.
Drain a small amount of HP to all targets.
name: Life O
note:
Third spell of Life.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.
Small drain to each target.

description:
A mass spell using death. Touch all targets.
Drain a small amount of HP to all targets.
name: Death O
note:
Third spell of Death.
Medium cost, low damage, touch all targets.
Small drain to each target.

name: -- Elemental X spells --
note:
Below is the list of all the basic mass 
spells using elements, also called "X"
spells.
"X" spells are medium-high level/rank
spells, doing a medium damage but with
a high MP cost and touching all targets.
They also have a small chance to inflict
status.

description:
A powerful mass spell using fire. Touch all targets.
Small chance to burn.
name: Fire X
note:
Last spell of Fire.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to burn.

description:
A powerful mass spell using thunder. Touch all targets.
Small chance to stun.
name: Thunder X
note:
Last spell of Thunder.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to stun.

description:
A powerful mass spell using ice. Touch all targets.
Small chance to freeze targets.
name: Ice X
note:
Last spell of Ice.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to freeze.

description:
A powerful mass spell using water. Touch all targets.
Small chance to slow targets.
name: Water X
note:
Last spell of Water.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to slow.

description:
A powerful mass spell using earth. Touch all targets.
Small chance to stun targets.
name: Stone X
note:
Last spell of Earth.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to stun.

description:
A powerful mass spell using wind. Touch all targets.
Small chance to slow targets.
name: Wind X
note:
Last spell of Wind.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to slow.

description: A powerful mass spell using light. Touch all targets.
name: Light X
note:
Last spell of Fire.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to blind.

description:
A powerful mass spell using darkness. Touch all targets.
Small chance to confuse targets.
name: Darkness X
note:
Last spell of Darkness.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to confuse.

description:
A powerful mass spell using arcane. Touch all targets.
Small chance to mute targets.
name: Arcane X
note:
Last spell of Arcane.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Small chance to mute.

description:
A powerful mass spell using life. Touch all targets.
Drain a medium amount of HP to all targets. Can blind.
name: Life X
note:
Last spell of Life.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Medium drain to each target
Small chance to blind.

description:
A powerful mass spell using death. Touch all targets.
Drain medium amount of HP to all targets. Can instakill.
name: Death X
note:
Last spell of Life.
High cost, medium damage, touch all targets.
Medium drain to each target
Very small chance to kill.

message1: attempts to grab some party member!
name: Assault Ivy Maiden

message1: throws her vines against the party!
name: Aassault Alraune

message1: slips her limbs to trap some party member!
name: Aassault Myconids

message1: attempts to trap a party member!
name: Aassault Lamia

message1: attempts to daze some party member!
name: Aassault Fairies

message1: attempts to grab some unfortunate girl with its vines!
name: Aassault PumpkinFiend

message1: webs a trap against the party!
name: Aassault Black Widow
-- Neutral Physics --
note:
Below is the list of all the basic skills
using physical element.
Physic skills use TP instead of MP
and requiere a weapon for being used in
most cases.

description:
Fills up the mana pool up to 20%
by using 1/4 TP points
name: Addrenaline Shot

description:
Fills up the mana pool up to 50%
by using 1/2 TP points
name: Addrenaline Boost

description: Replenishes the mana bar when TP bar is full
name: Addrenaline Rage
Tickle
note:
Capture the battler IDS and then cast
Tickling Assault

message1: attempts to catch her target with her vines!
name: Vine Attack
